Priya Surya

Skills:

Interests:

Startups Maps Food

Background:

Priya comes with strong global track record in user-oriented design, and business development, making her a great fit for cross-over positions. Prior to Startup School, she worked in financial inclusion and mobile money in emerging markets with the World Bank, and graduated from Harvard Kennedy School in 2010. With over forty countries and four languages under her belt, she thrives in diverse environments. Her proudest moment was when she created a public transport matatu map of Nairobi, Kenya. She loves to cook and meet people who are passionate about their work.
